statements: SELECT * FROM bike_routes;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM bike_routes WHERE difficulty_level > 2;
SELECT route_name, landmarks FROM bike_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM bike_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT difficulty_level FROM bike_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, difficulty_level, distance, landmarks FROM bike_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bike_routes WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance FROM bike_routes WHERE landmarks LIKE '%mountain%' ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, difficulty_level, distance, landmarks FROM bike_routes WHERE distance > 10 AND difficulty_level < 5 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM bike_routes WHERE difficulty_level = 2 OR landmarks IS NULL ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Intermediate';
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Hard' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Easy' AND distance > 10;
SELECT trail_id, trail_name, difficulty_level, distance FROM trail_information WHERE landmarks LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT route_name, distance FROM bicycle_routes WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM trail_information WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced' AND distance < 20;
SELECT trail_name, landmarks FROM trail_information WHERE landmarks LIKE '%waterfall%';
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance FROM bicycle_routes JOIN trail_information ON bicycle_routes.route_id = trail_information.trail_id WHERE bicycle_routes.difficulty_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT * FROM BicycleRoutes;
SELECT id, route_name, difficulty_level FROM BicycleRoutes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT * FROM Trails WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT trail_name, start_point, end_point FROM Trails WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy' ORDER BY trail_name ASC;
SELECT landmark_name, description FROM Landmarks WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM BicycleRoutes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT trail_name, start_point, end_point FROM Trails WHERE difficulty_level = 'Difficult' AND distance > 10;
SELECT route_name, landmarks FROM BicycleRoutes WHERE distance BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT landmark_name, description FROM Landmarks WHERE latitude < 50 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, distance FROM Trails WHERE start_point = 'City Park' OR end_point = 'Mountain Top'
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Intermediate';
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance_km FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Beginner' ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT trail_name, distance_km FROM trail_info WHERE difficulty_level='Advanced' LIMIT 3;
SELECT landmark_name, description FROM landmarks;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes;
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance_km FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT * FROM trail_info ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_name, landmark_1, landmark_2 FROM bicycle_routes JOIN route_landmarks ON bicycle_routes.route_id = route_landmarks.route_id WHERE landmark_id = 1;
SELECT trail_name, trail_type, difficulty_level FROM trail_info WHERE distance_km > 10;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes;
SELECT id, route_name, difficulty_level FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM bicycle_routes WHERE distance_km > 20;
SELECT * FROM trail_lengths ORDER BY length_km DESC;
SELECT t.route_name, l.landmark_name FROM bicycle_routes t JOIN trail_landmarks tl ON t.id = tl.trail_id JOIN popular_landmarks l ON l.id = tl.landmark_id;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_routes;
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level FROM bicycle_routes ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM bicycle_routes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY distance_km ASC;

SELECT t.difficulty_name, t.description, COUNT(tl.landmark_id) AS num_landmarks FROM trail_difficulty t JOIN trail_landmarks tl ON t.id = tl.trail_id GROUP BY t.difficulty_name ORDER BY num_landmarks DESC;

SELECT pl.landmark_name, br.route_name, tl.length_km FROM popular_landmarks pl JOIN trail_landmarks tm ON pl.id = tm.landmark_id JOIN bicycle_routes br ON br.id = tm.trail_id WHERE tl.length_km > 10 ORDER BY tl.length_km DESC, br.route_name ASC;
